headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MEADOW, CLAIRE S.

snippet: MEADOW--Claire S.,77, died peacefully January 9, 2016 of pancreatic cancer. Graduate, Hunter College and Columbia Law School; practicing real estate attorney. Founding member, Westchester Women's Bar Association; passionate supporter of Israel. Survived by beloved husband Myron Meadow, children Andrea Danziger, Roxanne (David) Cohen, Aaron Meadow and four grandchildren. 1/3
